org.nerd4j.csv.field.processor

Class FormatNumber<N extends Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nerd4j.csv.field.CSVFieldProcessor<N,String>
      • org.nerd4j.csv.field.processor.FormatNumber<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - type of the Number to be returned.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CSVRegistryEntry

    public final class FormatNumber<N extends Number>
extends CSVFieldProcessor<N,String>
    Represents a CSV field processor able to parse a given Number and return a String.
    Author:
    Nerd4j Team
